articles.author: Christina Wilkie, Brian Schwartz
articles.title: CEOs at Trump meeting: Ex-president ‘meandering’ and ‘doesn't know what he's talking about’ - CNBC
articles.description: Trump offered scant details on how he would reduce taxes and cut back on business regulations, according to two people in the room.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Former President Donald Trump failed to impress everyone in a room full of top CEOs Thursday at the Business Roundtable's quarterly meeting, multiple attendees told CNBC.
